title: The game close when  start a game
body:
When i start a game next to the champions selection the game close with the bugsplat.
a remedy for this problem?
Thanks.

replies.body: Bugsplats typically mean that your client encountered some type of critical error that it just couldn't recover from. Let's try going over the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), and make sure to go through each section. Hit me back up if you're not seeing any results from that!
